mapper.sql: id, ddhm, correlationID, fpqqlsh, code, msg, operateTime, createTime
mapper.insert: insert into resultofkp (ddhm, correlationID, fpqqlsh, code, msg, operateTime, createTime) values ( #{ddhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{correlationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fpqqlsh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(), #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select count(id) from resultofkp where ddhm = #{ddhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update resultofkp set ddhm = #{ddhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, correlationID = #{correlationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fpqqlsh = #{fpqqlsh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, msg = #{msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operateTime = now() where ddhm = #{ddhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into resultofkp (id, ddhm, correlationID, fpqqlsh, code, msg, operateTime, createTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ddhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{correlationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fpqqlsh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

correlationID = #{correlationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
msg = #{msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operateTime = #{operatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
